title.narrative: The Readiness support aims to address the gaps identified in the National Adaptation Plan (NAP) for Climate Change Impacts in Sri Lanka 2016-2025 and prepare project concept notes for prioritized adaptation projects.

description.narrative: The Readiness support aims to address the gaps identified in the National Adaptation Plan (NAP) for Climate Change Impacts in Sri Lanka 2016-2025 and prepare project concept notes for prioritized adaptation projects.

The project aims to build resilience of the most vulnerable sectors and communities in Sri Lanka to the adverse impacts of climate change by strengthening the country's capacity and system to implement the NAP.

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04557 Republic of Korea
